brand_identity.name: TechResona Pvt Ltd
brand_identity.visual_style: Modern Minimal Corporate with Electric Accents

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and major callouts. DO NOT use Inter.

mono.usage: Code snippets, API keys, technical data.

primary.name: Resona Indigo
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key brand elements.

secondary.name: Deep Slate
secondary.usage: Footer background, Admin sidebar, Dark mode backgrounds.

accent.name: Electric Teal
accent.usage: Highlights, 'New' badges, success indicators, gradient stops.

marketing_tetris.rules: Use asymmetry. Hero spans 8, secondary spans 4. Never fill 100% perfectly.

admin_control_room.rules: Dense packing. Widgets must stretch to fill height.

public_site.strategy: Custom HTML + Tailwind. NO Shadcn Cards.
public_site.buttons: Rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-medium transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
public_site.cards: Flat design, 1px border (slate-200), large padding (p-8), hover:border-indigo-500/50 transition-colors
public_site.nav: Sticky glassmorphism header. Logo left, Links center, CTA right.

admin_dashboard.forms: Shadcn Input/Select/Form. Labels must be clear and bold.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for elegance, 2px for UI controls.

rules.scroll: Parallax on hero images. Smooth scroll via Lenis is MANDATORY.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text. Use APCA for large text.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Do not use full-screen gradients. Use noise/texture.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lenis' and 'framer-motion' immediately. 2. Set up the font imports in index.css. 3. Build the Public Site using the 'Tetris' grid and Custom HTML. 4. Build the Admin Dashboard using Shadcn components but customize the radius and spacing to match the brand. 5. Ensure the SEO Super Admin features (JSON-LD, Robots.txt) are functional and editable.
